title: Turning Data Into Decisions: How the School of Sciences at JAIN (Deemed
description: New Delhi [India], January 31: In today's digital-first world, data is not just information--it is insight, strategy, and competitive advantage. From healthcare and finance to e-commerce and artificial intelligence, organisations rely on data to make smarter, faster, and more responsible decisions. At the School of Sciences (SSc), JAIN (Deemed-to-be University), this reality is shaping a new kind of undergraduate education through BSc Data Science, a Program designed to transform analytical curiosity into industry-ready expertise.

title: Cannot outsource thinking, creativity to AI: PSA Ajay Kumar Sood
description: In an interview with PTI ahead of the AI Impact Summit, Ajay Kumar Sood, the Principal Scientific Adviser to the Government of India, also favoured using existing laws to deal with the scourge of artificial intelligence-generated deepfakes, contending that strict legislation may "kill innovation".

description: A Bengaluru-based techie has gone viral after revealing how he used artificial intelligence to avoid getting caught watching Netflix at work, building a smart system that instantly switched his screen to work mode whenever his boss came nearby.
